title: kanaka vEla
sahitya:
kanakavEla karuNAlavAla kAtyAyani bAla kaN pArttaruL varashIla

anupallavi
 
anagha bhakta paripAla kallOlaghana vicitra svarajAla gAnalOla

caraNam
 
sakala lOka sharaNya kunjaradAsan sakala rOga nivAraNajanana maraNa sakala
shOka haraNa sarOruha caraNa sharavaNabhavA sharaNam kAttaruL idu taruNam
